cells.text: Using an exactly solvable statistical model we discuss the equation of state of large/heavy and

cells.text: short-living quark gluon plasma (QGP) bags.
cells.text_vi: Túi LIVED GLUON PLUON (QGP) sống ngắn.

cells.text: We argue that the large width of the QGP bags

cells.text: and in a strongly interacting medium.
